Episodes.Title: Fire in the Hole
Episodes.Plot: Gunslinging U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens faces off against his oldest friend in Harlan, Kentucky, a 21st Century Wild West.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Joelle Carter, Natalie Zea, Damon Herriman, Matt Craven, Peter Greene, Doug E. Doug, Kevin Rankin, Ryan O'Nan, Joel Garland, Daniel Stewart Sherman, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Riverbrook
Episodes.Plot: Raylan hunts an escaped prisoner who is determined to reunite with his ex-wife...and his stashed fortune.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kristin Bauer van Straten, Chris Ellis, Damon Herriman, Johnny Sneed, Myk Watford, Bill Glass, Colleen McGrann, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Fixer
Episodes.Plot: In tracking a vanished confidential informant, Raylan goes against a pair of violent ex-cons who are just dying for a showdown with "The Kentucky Cowboy."
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: David Eigenberg, Greg Cromer, Page Kennedy, Erin Cardillo, Jessica Camacho

Episodes.Title: Long in the Tooth
Episodes.Plot: Raylan leaves to California to follow the trails of a criminal who has evaded him twice in the past, and Raylan is determined that the third time won't be the same.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Alan Ruck, Michele Nordin, Lance Barber, Brian Goodman, Brandon Keener, David Warshofsky, Clarence Williams III

Episodes.Title: The Lord of War and Thunder
Episodes.Plot: Raylan's father is arrested in the wake of a confrontation with the tenant of a house he and Raylan's stepmother own.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Linda Gehringer, Rick Gomez, Eddie Jemison, Brent Sexton, Karina Logue, David Meunier, Raymond J. Barry

Episodes.Title: The Collection
Episodes.Plot: After an apparent suicide on an opulent Kentucky horse farm, Raylan must resist the sexy widow as he searches for the dead man's missing art.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Katherine LaNasa, Brett Cullen, Rick Gomez, Tony Hale, Peter Jason, Robert Picardo, William Ragsdale, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Blind Spot
Episodes.Plot: Raylan foils an attempt on Ava's life and vows to find out who was behind it. Later, Raylan finds out that Ava may not have been the target.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: M.C. Gainey, Linda Gehringer, James Immekus, Ray McKinnon, David Meunier, Brent Sexton, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Blowback
Episodes.Plot: When a murderous inmate takes hostages, Raylan must scramble to defuse the situation before the bullets start flying.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: W. Earl Brown, Jere Burns, M.C. Gainey, Rick Gomez, Fredric Lehne, William Ragsdale, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Hatless
Episodes.Plot: Raylan has a few drinks and gets himself beaten up, after being suspended as a Marshall. He pulls himself together and decides to jeopardise his career further by going after the thugs who have been harassing his ex-wife's new husband.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Malik Yoba, Jere Burns, David Eigenberg, Steven Flynn, Tom Kiesche, William Ragsdale, Travis Wester

Episodes.Title: The Hammer
Episodes.Plot: Determined to repair the damage he's done, Raylan takes time away from his assignment bodyguarding an eccentric judge to track down an old lead.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen Root, Doug E. Doug, Jenni Blong, Sean Bridgers, Brad Carter, Darin Heames, David Meunier, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Veterans
Episodes.Plot: When Boyd Crowder and his crusaders become vigilantes, Raylan takes it upon himself to try to shut them down.
Episodes.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry, M.C. Gainey, Linda Gehringer, Jim Haynie, Damon Herriman, Brent Sexton, Kevin E. West, Brad Carter, David Meunier, Ray Porter, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Fathers and Sons
Episodes.Plot: In order to work for the Marshal's Office, Raylan's dad Arlo agrees to become a double agent and work for Bo Crowder. Meanwhile, Bo sets up a meth lab to get back in business.
Episodes.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry, Alexandra Barreto, Jordi Caballero, Mo Gaffney, M.C. Gainey, Linda Gehringer, Rick Gomez, William Ragsdale, David Meunier, Ray Porter, Omar Avila, Joshua Bitton, Pat Skipper, Walton Goggins

Episodes.Title: Bulletville
Episodes.Plot: In the season finale, things come to a head in Harlan when the worlds of Raylan, Boyd and Bo Crowder collide.
Episodes.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry, Alexandra Barreto, M.C. Gainey, Omar Avila, David Meunier, Ray Porter, Walton Goggins
